name: Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: McGriff v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of October, 2003, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
838 A.2d 564
Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
